room_title: Escape room "Beat the Bomb" by Beat the Bomb in New York
review: This place is awesome. Very interactive, lots of laughs, challenges your listening, visual skills. Communication is key. Just a great experience overall.

room_title: Escape room "Beat the Bomb" by Beat the Bomb in New York
review: Everything was awesome from the minute we entered the building. Loved the experience, the staff was great and the game was a lot of fun. Planning on returning.

room_title: Escape room "Beat the Bomb" by Beat the Bomb in New York
review: It was amazing! I would definitely do it again and bring the kids! It's like a fun, educational workout.

room_title: Escape room "Beat the Bomb" by Beat the Bomb in New York
review: Amazing. Besides the great experience with the game rooms themselves, the staff were so great! Helpful, kind, engaging and fun! I would love to come back with more friends!

room_title: Escape room "Beat the Bomb" by Beat the Bomb in New York
review: Super cool experience. Took my boyfriend for his birthday and he loved it! Worth the money. I must say, the first room is confusing. Youâ€™ll get the hang of it though after a few. Also, it does require physical agility for the laser maze. Definitely recommend!! Once in a lifetime chance thing! Good luck beating the bomb!
